## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install fhbasecoat in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure fhbasecoat package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to fhbasecoat
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/taya-nicholas/fhbasecoat):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/taya-nicholas/fhbasecoat.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/taya-nicholas/fhbasecoat)

``` sh
$ conda install -c taya-nicholas fhbasecoat
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/fhbasecoat/)

``` sh
$ pip install fhbasecoat
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/taya-nicholas/fhbasecoat)’s
[pages](https://taya-nicholas.github.io/fhbasecoat/). Additionally you
can find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/taya-nicholas/fhbasecoat) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/fhbasecoat/) respectively.
